name: Magician's Scales
text:
[ Skill activation ]
Flip this card over when you activate this Skill.
[ Effect ]
Once per Duel, you can Tribute 1 "Arcana Force" monster and add 1 "Normal Spell from your Deck to your hand, also for the rest of this Duel, you cannot Summon any monsters, except "Arcana Force" monsters.
